description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Project Gert is a puzzling platformer with an awesome story, featuring voice acting from Mad TV's Dan Oster and Battleground's Lindsey Payne. The second installment in this series serves partly as a reboot, and mirrors the developer's latest novel, 'Project Gert,' rel. Dec 2012.
